document.full_text: a statement purporting to come from a son of osama bin laden denounced the al qaeda leader's killing as "criminal" and said his burial at sea had humiliated the family, an online monitoring service said.
document.title: son says bin laden sea burial demeans family: report
lines_and_colors: a statement purporting to come from a son of osama bin laden denounced the al qaeda leader's killing as "criminal" and said his burial at sea had humiliated the family, an online monitoring service said.
